name: Foam Climber
description:
It’s as easy as 1,2,3!

Step 1: Grab your foam gun!
Step 2: Spray your foam gun in front of you, making bridges and inclines!
Step 3: Run! Can you get to the finish line before your rival?

Foam Climber is an easy and addictive racing game, where you save yourself from deadly pitfalls using your handy spray gun! But watch out, run out of foam at the wrong time, and it’s all over!

Race against your rival in this new and exciting game!

Foam Climber features:
- Create your own paths
- Race against others
- Heart racing gameplay
